message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is an exceptional opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to sell the product to you for $95.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $95 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go to $90. This would be a fair price for both of us.
